verses.verse: And 'Elohim <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> Noach <WH5146> and his sons <WH1121>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8798>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8798>, and replenish <WH4390> <WH8798> the earth <WH776>.

And the fear of you <WH4172> and the dread of you <WH2844> shall be upon every beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>, and upon every fowl <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, upon all that moveth <WH7430> <WH8799> upon the earth <WH127>, and upon all the fishes <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220>; into your hand <WH3027> are they delivered <WH5414> <WH8738>.
Havahry moving thing <WH7431> that liveth <WH2416> shall be meat <WH402> for you; even as the green <WH3418> herb <WH6212> have I given <WH5414> <WH8804> you all things.
But <WH389> flesh <WH1320> with the life <WH5315> thereof, which is the blood <WH1818> thereof, shall ye not eat <WH398> <WH8799>.

And surely <WH389> your blood <WH1818> of your lives <WH5315> will I require <WH1875> <WH8799>; at the hand <WH3027> of every beast <WH2416> will I require it <WH1875> <WH8799>, and at the hand <WH3027> of man <WH120>; at the hand <WH3027> of every man's <WH376> brother <WH251> will I require <WH1875> <WH8799> the life <WH5315> of man <WH120>.

Whoso sheddeth <WH8210> <WH8802> man's <WH120> blood <WH1818>, by man <WH120> shall his blood <WH1818> be shed <WH8210> <WH8735>: for in the image <WH6754> of 'Elohim <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH8804> he man <WH120>.
And you, be ye fruitful <WH6509> <WH8798>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8798>; bring forth abundantly <WH8317> <WH8798> in the earth <WH776>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8798> therein.
And 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Noach <WH5146>, and to his sons <WH1121> with him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
And I, behold, I establish <WH6965> <WH8688> my covenant <WH1285> with you, and with your seed <WH2233> after you <WH310>;

And with every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that is with you, of the fowl <WH5775>, of the cattle <WH929>, and of every beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> with you; from all that go out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the ark <WH8392>, to every beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>.

And I will establish <WH6965> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> with you; neither shall all flesh <WH1320> be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735> any more by the waters <WH4325> of a flood <WH3999>; neither shall there any more be a flood <WH3999> to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> the earth <WH776>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, This is the token <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285> which I <WH589> make <WH5414> <WH8802> between me and you and every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that is with you, for perpetual <WH5769> generations <WH1755>:
I do set <WH5414> <WH8804> my bow <WH7198> in the cloud <WH6051>, and it shall be for a token <WH226> of a covenant <WH1285> between me and the earth <WH776>.
And it shall come to pass, when I bring <WH6049> <WH8763> a cloud <WH6051> over the earth <WH776>, that the bow <WH7198> shall be seen <WH7200> <WH8738> in the cloud <WH6051>:

And I will remember <WH2142> <WH8804> my covenant <WH1285>, which is between me and you and every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> of all flesh <WH1320>; and the waters <WH4325> shall no more <WH5750> become a flood <WH3999> to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> all flesh <WH1320>.

And the bow <WH7198> shall be in the cloud <WH6051>; and I will look upon it <WH7200> <WH8804>, that I may remember <WH2142> <WH8800> the everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> 'Elohim <WH430> and <WH996> every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> of all flesh <WH1320> that is upon the earth <WH776>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Noach <WH5146>, This is the token <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285>, which I have established <WH6965> <WH8689> between me and all flesh <WH1320> that is upon the earth <WH776>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Noach <WH5146>, that went forth <WH3318> <WH8802> of the ark <WH8392>, were Shem <WH8035>, and Ham <WH2526>, and Yefet <WH3315>: and Ham <WH2526> <WH1931> is the father <WH1> of Kanahan <WH3667>.
These are the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Noach <WH5146>: and of them was the whole earth <WH776> overspread <WH5310> <WH8804>.
And Noach <WH5146> began <WH2490> <WH8686> to be an husbandman <WH376> <WH127>, and he planted <WH5193> <WH8799> a vineyard <WH3754>:
And he drank <WH8354> <WH8799> of the wine <WH3196>, and was drunken <WH7937> <WH8799>; and he was uncovered <WH1540> <WH8691> within <WH8432> his tent <WH168>.

And Ham <WH2526>, the father <WH1> of Kanahan <WH3667>, saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the nakedness <WH6172> of his father <WH1>, and told <WH5046> <WH8686> his two <WH8147> brethren <WH251> without <WH2351>.

And Shem <WH8035> and Yefet <WH3315> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a garment <WH8071>, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> it upon both <WH8147> their shoulders <WH7926>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> backward <WH322>, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the nakedness <WH6172> of their father <WH1>; and their faces <WH6440> were backward <WH322>, and they saw <WH7200> <WH8804> not their father's <WH1> nakedness <WH6172>.
And Noach <WH5146> awoke <WH3364> <WH8799> from his wine <WH3196>, and knew <WH3045> <WH8799> what his younger <WH6996> son <WH1121> had done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto him.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> be Kanahan <WH3667>; a servant <WH5650> of servants <WH5650> shall he be unto his brethren <WH251>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Shem <WH8035>; and Kanahan <WH3667> shall be <WH1961> <WH8799> his servant <WH5650>.
'Elohim <WH430> shall enlarge <WH6601> <WH8686> Yefet <WH3315>, and he shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in the tents <WH168> of Shem <WH8035>; and Kanahan <WH3667> shall be his servant <WH5650>.
And Noach <WH5146> lived <WH2421> <WH8799> after <WH310> the flood <WH3999> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141>.
And all the days <WH3117> of Noach <WH5146> were nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141>: and he died <WH4191> <WH8799>.
